GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.39 to before v6.0.10
GSD.description:
scsi: target: tcm_loop: Fix possible name leak in tcm_loop_setup_hba_bus()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.10 by commit dce0589a3faec9e2e543e97bca7e62592ec85585, it was introduced in version v2.6.39 by commit 3703b2c5d041a68095cdd22380c23ce27d449ad7. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: scsi: target: tcm_loop: Fix possible name leak in tcm_loop_setup_hba_bus()
